The Rhode Island Department of Health: s requirement for health-care workers to get immunized or wear surgical masks when having contact with patients.
The lawsuit filed by the SEIU Healthcare: District 1199, arguing that the regulations violated due-process and collective-bargaining rights.
The withdrawal of the union: s lawsuit with the aim of reaching a compromise with the health department.
The presence of relevant: peer-reviewed studies indicating that vaccinating health-care workers may protect patients, including the study conducted by researchers at the Institute of Virology at the University of Glasgow and the study published in BMJ.
